mapper.sql: t.id, t.org_code, t.outpat_form_no, t.drug_name, t.drug_std_name, t.drug_std_code, t.notes, t.last_update_dtime
mapper.delete: delete from outpatient_drug where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into outpatient_drug ( org_code, outpat_form_no, drug_name, drug_std_name, drug_std_code, notes, last_update_dtime ) values( #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatFormNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugStdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugStdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update outpatient_drug set org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outpat_form_no = #{outpatFormNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_name = #{drugName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_std_name = #{drugStdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drug_std_code = #{drugStdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_dtime = #{lastUpdateDtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
